tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ
comments: I struggled in this class after falling behind but with the help of the prof and tutoring I was on the right track. John is a great instructor.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This Professor is awesome!! he is a teacher; not an instructor. I learned more from him in 14 weeks than I did in 4 years in high school. If math is not your strong point; take his class and you will learn.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: He knows his stuff.But there is a diff btwn knowing material &knowing how 2teach the material! I felt he knew the material but didnt know how 2deliver it 2students. Wth him its either u get it/ u dont!He teaches the material & the next class your tested on it! No midterm or finals which can hurt u. usually they can be ur cushion if ur failing!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Homework is mandatory for your own good. 2 math related papers. Goes over anything you need to go over as well as guidelines(expectations). Tests weekly: also for your own good. Can be a little out there, but is excellent at explaining what needs to be explained. Tests often are on text material and not lecture, you should definitely use the book.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This teacher is really helpful. He makes the class interesting and always stays a little longer if you have any questions and will work out any problems in homework. Homework in mandatory but he does not check it. He quizzes every week which is amazing because you don\'t have any tests. He makes the class interesting and he is very nice.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: If you respect him, he will respect you. There was a hispanic woman in my class who had problems formulating her questions. Whenever she had problems getting her words out he said, " I answer questions, not comments." Make sure you know what you want to ask before you raise your hand to avoid hearing that belittling statement at all costs.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Professor Kozarski is able to communicate the material well. Although, he does have trouble communicating well with all students. "I answer questions not comments." Over all the class will teach you valuable information. Make sure you are polite to the teacher and he will be polite to you.
